title: [Large-scale] Medical Team-based Patient Safety Simulation Training: TeamSTEPPS® Basic Course

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental medical terminology and understanding of patient safety concepts
context.additional_context: Team collaboration training based on mathematical thinking for entry-level professionals in healthcare, legal, and technical fields.

learning_goals: Learners apply clear communication strategies (SBAR) among team members with over 80% accuracy
Learners practice all four TeamSTEPPS® competencies (task management, team leadership, situational awareness, mutual support) at least three times in simulation environments
Learners identify five or more risk factors and establish response protocols in patient safety incident scenarios
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
